casebody.data:
STATE TREASURER, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Michael A. KENNEDY, Defendant-Appellant,
and
JP Morgan Chase Bank and Office of Retirement Services, Defendants. SC: 157221
COA: 336202 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 2, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing his reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted for filing if submitted on or before May 23, 2018.
